projects.title: I-NOTES
projects.description: iNotes is a MERN app in which you can store your notes in cloud. It has a fully. It also has a user authentication system for storing and reading a user and its data from database in MongoDB

projects.title: RATTAN TECH
projects.description: RattanTech is a React app developed using ReactJS and ChakraUI which displays the landing page and also it is made fully responsive using SCSS

projects.title: VIDEO HUB
projects.description: VideoHub is a React app developed using ReactJS and ChakraUI that displays the left drawer navigation and also it is made fully responsive using SCSS

projects.title: XCrypto
projects.description: XCrypto is a crypto information app developed using ReactJS mirroring the original crypto info from the coinsgeckoAPI. Integrated APIs to fetch and display news show data demonstrating API integration skills

projects.title: NEWS WORLD
projects.description: NewsWorld is a news app developed using HTML5 CSS3 JavaScript and ReactJS mirroring the original News from the newsAPI. Integrated APIs to fetch and display news show data demonstrating API integration skills
